price: 26. Etikaka solo ya mpimbo na suka lokola malasi, na yango esengeli nabaye bazali kolikia тропа yango basala molende.
arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: khitāmuhu mis'kun wafī dhālika falyatanāfasi al-mutanāfisūna
